entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 30 March 2023
